mapper.sql: id, name, password, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT su.id id, su.`name` name, su.email email, su.mobile mobile, su.`status` `status`, su.dept_id dept_id, sd.name dept_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON su.dept_id = sd.id where su.del_flag = 0
and su.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and su.mobile = mobile
order by su.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (name, password, salt, email, mobile, dept_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{dept_id}, #{create_by}, now(), last_update_by, now())
mapper.update:

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{status},
dept_id = #{dept_id},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
